sentences.sContent: No, blacks have all kinds of jobs.
sentences.sCn: 不，黑人从事各种各样的工作。

sentences.sContent: People have all kinds of ideas about what it should be.
sentences.sContent_eng: People have all kinds of ideas about what it should be.
sentences.sCn: 人们对创新是什么有各种各样的想法。

sentences.sContent: This seemed horrible to me, but I got all kinds of responses.
sentences.sContent_eng: This seemed horrible to me, but I got all kinds of responses.
sentences.sCn: 这对我来说很可怕，但我得到了各种各样的反馈。
